issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Version 0.15.3 of jsch incorporates changes to add ciphers for logjam protection. See http://www.jcraft.com/jsch/ChangeLog.

Since there are no developer visible changes, updating pom is sufficient.

Doublechecked in my environment.
fields.summary: Enable fencing for logjam-protected ssh servers
fields.environment: If a site uses logjam protected ssh servers no common ciphers can be found and fencing breaks because the fencing process cannot be initiated by zkfc.
